Core

Clients

MLClient offers multiple clients to access a MarkLogic Server. Each high-level client is designed for a specific endpoint. Example clients:

Client

Endpoint

DocumentsClient

/v1/documents

EvalClient

/v1/eval

LogsClient

/manage/v2/logs
